instruction.value: Administer at 15 to 30 minute intervals as required for persistent ventricular fibrillation. Up to a maximum total dose of 30 mg/kg.
May repeat dose in 1 to 2 hours if arrhythmia persists.
May repeat dose every 10 to 20 minutes as required, up to a total dose of 30 mg/kg.

additionalnotes.value: Ventricular Arrhythmias. (other than fibrillation.). Maintenance dose. Bretylium dose should be reduced and stopped within 3 to 5 days. Reduce dose to 25 to 50% of usual dose in patients with Creatinine Clearance of 10 to 50 mL/minute, recommend avoiding in patients with Creatinine Clearance less than 10 mL/minute..
Arrhythmias. Maintenance dose. MAXIMUM dose: 40 mg/kg/day.
